jpo
Class HtmlDistillerThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      jpo.HtmlDistillerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class HtmlDistillerThread
extends java.lang.Thread

This thread object generates a web of html pages that allows you to browse groups of pictures using a web browsers. The resulting html pages can be posted to the internet. Relative addressing has been used throughout to facilitate this.

Nested Class Summary
private  class HtmlDistillerThread.ButtonListener
          A button listener for the cancel button on the progress frame.
(package private)  class HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
          Inner class that keeps a buffer of the picture descriptions and will output a table row with the buffered descriptions when the buffer has reached it's limit.

Constructor Detail

HtmlDistillerThread

public HtmlDistillerThread(java.io.File htmlDirectory,
                           int picsPerRow,
                           int thumbnailWidth,
                           int thumbnailHeight,
                           int midresWidth,
                           int midresHeight,
                           int cellspacing,
                           boolean exportHighres,
                           boolean linkToHighres,
                           float jpgQuality,
                           SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode startNode,
                           boolean generateDHTML,
                           java.lang.String bodyTag)
Creates and starts a Thread that writes the picture nodes from the specified startNode to the target directory.

Parameters:
htmlDirectory - The directory that is supposed to receive the html files.
picsPerRow - The numer of pictures desired side by side
thumbnailWidth - The width the thumbnail may not exceed
thumbnailHeight - The height the thumbnail may not exceed
midresWidth - The width the midres picture may not exceed
midresHeight - The height the midres picture may not exceed
cellspacing - The space between the cells when more then 1 picture is to be output side by side. Ususally 10.
exportHighres - An indicator whether to copy the highres imgaes to the target dir structure
linkToHighres - An indicator whether a link to the highres pictures should be build into the output html
jpgQuality - The Quality with which to compress the jpg images.
startNode - The node from which this is all to be built.
generateDHTML - Set to true if DHTML effects should be generated
bodyTag - The tag for the body of the HTML document with color or img.
Method Detail

run

public void run()
Method that is invoked by the thread to do things asynchroneousely.

writeAsHtml

public void writeAsHtml(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode groupNode)
This method writes out an HTML page with the small images alined next to each other Each Group and picture is created in an html file called jpo_1234.htm except for the first one that gets named index.htm. 1234 is the internal hashCode of the node so that we can translate parents and children to each other.

The object wide groupCounter is used to track how many groups have been created so far.

Parameters:
groupNode - The node at which the extraction is to start.

                       throws java.io.IOException
Write html about a picture to the output.

Parameters:
n - The node for which the HTML is to be written
out - The opened output stream to which the thumbnail tags should be written
groupFile - ???
childNumber - ???
childCount - ???
descriptionsBuffer - A buffer for the thumbnails page
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was some sort of IO Error.
